description: Auto-extract metadata (title, date, agency, document number) from uploaded documents using OCR and text parsing. Supports PDF, scanned images, and text files. Reduces manual data entry and enables bulk uploads.
goal: Full automation pipeline - reduce manual entry, improve accuracy, enable bulk uploads
requirements: Auto-extract title/document name from header or filename
Identify agency (FBI, CIA, DPD, etc.) from letterhead or content
out_of_scope: Full transcript generation (complete OCR of entire document)
Entity extraction (detecting related people and locations)
constraints: No paid external APIs (no Google Vision, AWS Textract, OpenAI)
